00061 stack <void*> modigliani_core_stack;

00064 void BeginMakeMembraneCompartmentSequence()
00065 {
00066         NTBP_membrane_compartment_sequence_o* tmpPtr =  new  NTBP_membrane_compartment_sequence_o;
00067         modigliani_core_stack.push(tmpPtr);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void EndMakeMembraneCompartmentSequence()
00071 {
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 void BeginMakeCylindricalMembraneCompartment()
00076 {
00077     NTBP_custom_cylindrical_compartment_o *tmpPtr =  new NTBP_custom_cylindrical_compartment_o;
00078         modigliani_core_stack.push(tmpPtr);
00079 }
00080 
00081 void EndMakeCylindricalMembraneCompartment()
00082 {
00083         NTBP_custom_cylindrical_compartment_o *tmpPtr   = static_cast(NTBP_custom_cylindrical_compartment_o*)   modigliani_core_stack.pop();
00084         static_cast<NTBP_membrane_compartment_sequence_o*>(modigliani_core_stack.top())->PushBak(tmpPtr);
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 void BeginMakeSphericalMembraneCompartment()
00089 {
00090         cerr << "modigliani_core::MakeSphericalMembraneCompartment - Error : Not implemented." << endl;
00091         exit(1);
00092 }
00093 void EndMakeSphericalMembraneCompartment()
00094 {
00095         cerr << "modigliani_core::MakeSphericalMembraneCompartment - Error : Not implemented." << endl;
00096         exit(1);
00097 }

00099 
00100 /*
00101               tmpNaPtr->SetSimulationMode(NTBP_DETERMINISTIC);
00102                   tmpNaPtr->SetSimulationMode(NTBP_LANGEVIN);
00103                   tmpNaPtr->SetSimulationMode(NTBP_BINOMIALPOPULATION);
00104 */
00105 void BeginMakeIonChannel(NTid channelTypeNa)
00106 {
00107       NTBP_membrane_current_o *tmpNaPtr;
00108         switch (channelTypeNa) {
00109                 case 1:
00110                       /* Stochastic active ion-channel currents */
00111                             tmpNaPtr =
00112                     new NTBP_multi_sodium_current_o (static_cast<NTBP_membrane_compartment_o*>(modigliani_core_stack.top())->_area(),
00113                         60, 20e-9   /* mSiemens per channel */
00114                             break;
00115                 default: cerr <<"Somasimulator-v1 - Error  : Invalid Na channel type specified. Exiting."; exit(NT_PARAM_OUT_OF_RANGE); break;
00116         }
00117         modigliani_core_stack.push(tmpNaPtr);
00118 }
00119 
00120 void EndMakeIonChannel()
00121 {
00122         NTBP_membrane_current_o *tmpPtr = static_cast<NTBP_membrane_current_o*>(modigliani_core_stack.pop());
00123         static_cast<NTBP_membrane_compartment_o*>(modigliani_core_stack.top())->AttachCurrent (tmpNaPtr, NTBP_IONIC);
00124 }

00128 struct ModiglianiFormatSkipGrammar_t : public grammar<ModiglianiFormatSkipGrammar_t>
00129 {
00130     template <typename ScannerT>
00131     struct definition
00132     {
00133         definition(ModiglianiFormatSkipGrammar_t const& /*self*/)
00134         {
00135             skip =            "//" >> *(anychar_p - '\n') >> '\n'     // C++ comment
00136                             | "/*" >> *(anychar_p - "*/") >> "*/";     // C comment
00137 
00138                 }
00139         rule<ScannerT> skip;
00140 
00141         rule<ScannerT> const&
00142         start() const { return skip; }
00143     };
00144 };
00145 
00146 
00147 struct ModiglianiModelFormatGrammar_t : public grammar< ModiglianiModelFormatGrammar_t >
00148 {
00149   template <typename ScannerT>
00150 
00151   struct definition
00152   {
00153     definition(ModiglianiModelFormatGrammar_t const& /* self */)
00154     {
00155             // NOTE: additional tokes are ion_channel_model names and algorithm names defined in place the respective rules
00156         
00157             keywords = "NEURON","SEQUENCE","TREE","SPHERE","CYLINDER","SPECIFIC_RESISTANCE","SPECIFIC_CAPACITANCE",
00158       "RADIUS","LENGTH","TEMPERATURE","ION_CHANNEL","CHANNEL_CONDUCTANCE","Q10","BASE_TEMPERATURE",
00159             "DENSITY","ALGORITHM","IDENTIFIER";
00160 
00161             // highlevel tokens
00162           NEURON   = strlit<>("NEURON");
00163       SEQUENCE = strlit<>("SEQUENCE");
00164       TREE     = strlit<>("TREE");
00165 
00166       // compartment tokens
00167       SPHERE   = strlit<>("SPHERE");
00168       CYLINDER = strlit<>("CYLINDER");
00169             SPECIFIC_RESISTANCE  = strlit<>("SPECIFIC_RESISTANCE");
00170       SPECIFIC_CAPACITANCE = strlit<>("SPECIFIC_CAPACITANCE");
00171       RADIUS      = strlit<>("RADIUS");
00172       LENGTH      = strlit<>("LENGTH");
00173       TEMPERATURE = strlit<>("TEMPERATURE");
00174       RADIUS      = strlit<>("RADIUS");
00175 
00176       // ion channel tokens
00177             ION_CHANNEL = strlit<>("ION_CHANNEL");
00178             CHANNEL_CONDUCTANCE = strlit<>("CHANNEL_CONDUCTANCE");
00179             Q10 =              strlit<>("Q10");
00180             BASE_TEMPERATURE = strlit<>("BASE_TEMPERATURE");
00181             DENSITY     = strlit<>("DENSITY");
00182             ALGORITHM   = strlit<>("ALGORITHM");
00183 
00184             // C-style variable names
00185             IDENTIFIER =  lexeme_d[
00186                     ((alpha_p | '_' | '$') >> *(alnum_p | '_' | '$'))
00187                     - (keywords >> anychar_p - (alnum_p | '_' | '$'))
00188                       ];
00189 
00190 
00191       // root symbol
00192       expression_ = (network_ | neuron_);
00193 
00194       network_ = NEURON >> ch_p('{') >> (*(uint_p >> neuron_ >> (*( uint_p >> uint_p))))  >> ch_p('}'); //2DO NOT IMPLEMENTED
00195 
00196       neuron_    = NEURON >> ch_p('{') >> membrane_ >> ch_p('}');
00197 
00198       membrane_  = (membrane_compartment_sequence_ | membrane_compartment_tree_ | membrane_compartment_ );
00199 
00200       membrane_compartment_sequence_ = SEQUENCE >> ch_p('{') >> membrane_compartment_ >> (* membrane_compartment_) >> ch_p('}');
00201 
00202       membrane_compartment_tree_ = TREE >>  ch_p('{') >> (*(uint_p >> membrane_compartment_ >> (*(uint_p)) )) >> ch_p('}');
00203 
00204       membrane_compartment_ = membrane_compartment_type_ >> ch_p('{') >> (* (membrane_compartment_param_ | ion_channel_)) >> ch_p('}');
00205 
00206       membrane_compartment_type_ = SPHERE | CYLINDER;
00207 
00208       membrane_compartment_param_ = (membrane_resistance_ | membrane_capacitance_ | radius_ | length_ | temperature_);
00209 
00210       membrane_resistance_ = SPECIFIC_RESISTANCE >> real_p;
00211 
00212       membrane_capacitance_ = SPECIFIC_CAPACITANCE >> real_p;
00213 
00214       radius_ =  (RADIUS >> real_p);
00215 
00216       length_ =  LENGTH >> real_p;
00217 
00218       temperature_ = TEMPERATURE >> real_p;
00219 
00220       ion_channel_ = ION_CHANNEL >> ion_channel_model_ >> ch_p('{')  >> (*(ion_channel_param_)) >> ch_p('}');
00221 
00222       ion_channel_param_ = ( ion_channel_algorithm_ |
00223                              single_channel_conductance_ |
00224                                q10_ |
00225                              base_temperature_ |
00226                                                channel_density_
00227       );
00228 
00229             ion_channel_model_ =  ( str_p("NA_SGA_HH") |
00230                   str_p("NA_PATLAK") |
00231                   str_p("NA_COLBERT_AXONAL") |
00232                   str_p("NA_HRANVIER")
00233                 );
00234 
00235 
00236       ion_channel_algorithm_ = ALGORITHM >> (     str_p("DETERMINISTIC") |
00237                                                            str_p("LANGEVIN") |
00238                                                            str_p("SINGLE_CHANNEL") |
00239                                                            str_p("BINOMIALPOPULATION") |
00240                                                            str_p("GILLESPIE")      |
00241                                                            str_p("NOISY_MEAN")
00242                                                          );
00243 
00244       single_channel_conductance_ = CHANNEL_CONDUCTANCE >> real_p;
00245 
00246       q10_ = Q10 >> real_p;
00247 
00248       base_temperature_ = BASE_TEMPERATURE >> real_p;
00249 
00250       channel_density_ = DENSITY >> real_p;
00251     }
00252 
00253 
00254         // keywords
00255         symbols<> keywords;
00256 
00257         // terminal symbols
00258     rule<ScannerT>  NEURON,SEQUENCE,TREE,SPHERE,CYLINDER,SPECIFIC_RESISTANCE,SPECIFIC_CAPACITANCE,
00259       RADIUS,LENGTH,TEMPERATURE,ION_CHANNEL,CHANNEL_CONDUCTANCE,Q10,BASE_TEMPERATURE,
00260             DENSITY,ALGORITHM,IDENTIFIER;
00261 
00262 
00263         // nonterminal symbols
00264     rule<ScannerT> expression_,
00265       network_, neuron_,
00266       membrane_,
00267       membrane_compartment_sequence_, membrane_compartment_tree_,
00268       membrane_compartment_, membrane_compartment_type_,
00269       ion_channel_,
00270       ion_channel_model_, ion_channel_param_, ion_channel_algorithm_,
00271       single_channel_conductance_, q10_, base_temperature_, channel_density_,
00272       membrane_compartment_param_,
00273       membrane_resistance_, membrane_capacitance_, radius_, length_, temperature_;
00274 
00275     rule<ScannerT> const& start() const { return neuron_; }
00276 
00277   };    
00278     
00279 };  
00280 
00281 
00282 
00283 template<typename GrammarT>
00284 void
00285 parse(GrammarT const& g, char const* filename)
00286 {
00287     ifstream in(filename);
00288 
00289     if (!in)
00290     {
00291         cerr << "Could not open input file: " << filename << endl;
00292         return;
00293     }
00294 
00295     in.unsetf(ios::skipws); //  Turn of white space skipping on the stream
00296 
00297     vector<char> vec;
00298     std::copy(
00299         istream_iterator<char>(in),
00300         istream_iterator<char>(),
00301         std::back_inserter(vec));
00302 
00303     vector<char>::const_iterator start = vec.begin();
00304     vector<char>::const_iterator end = vec.end();
00305 
00306         ModiglianiFormatSkipGrammar_t skip;
00307 
00308     parse_info<vector<char>::const_iterator> result =
00309         parse(start, end, g, skip);
00310 
00311     if (result.full)
00312         cerr << filename << " Parses OK" << endl;
00313     else {
00314         cerr << filename << " Fails Parsing" << endl;
00315         for (int i = 0; i < 50; i++)
00316         {
00317             if (result.stop == end)
00318                 break;
00319             cerr << *result.stop++;
00320         }
00321         cerr << endl;
00322     }
00323 }
